thread.title: Tammy Marbuery-Marbuery
thread.title_full: Dresslily 的点评人 Tammy Marbuery-Marbuery

author: Tammy Marbuery-Marbuery
title: Tammy Marbuery-Marbuery
text: I placed my order on January 10,2017, still says its been processed, I contacted them and they said to either order something in stock...Which the items I ordered says they are in stock daily or wait til feb 25th when they expect to have them back in stock to be shipped. I dont think i will be receiving anything...Guess you can only trust fashionmia for an overseas company. Months are just crazy to wait for anything to even be order .L1701101812242218
